Structs/Expression.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Initialize an expression with an operator and arguments

Structs/Expression/Element.html.name: Element
Structs/Expression/Element.html.abstract: An ExpressionElement can be either a op (associated with a String)

Structs/Expression/Argument.html.name: Argument
Structs/Expression/Argument.html.abstract: An ExpressionArgument is either a literal (associated with a double, string, boolean, or null value)

Structs/Expression.html.name: Expression
Structs/Expression.html.abstract: An Expression defines a formula for computing the value of any layout property, paint property,

Expressions.html#/s:10MapboxMaps3Expa.name: Exp
Expressions.html#/s:10MapboxMaps3Expa.abstract: An Expression defines a formula for computing the value of any layout property, paint property,

Structs/ModelScaleMode.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: map
Structs/ModelScaleMode.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Model is scaled so that it’s always the same size relative to other map features. The property model-scale specifies how many meters each unit in the model file should cover.

Structs/ModelScaleMode.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: viewport
Structs/ModelScaleMode.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Model is scaled so that it’s always the same size on the screen. The property model-scale specifies how many pixels each unit in model file should cover.

Structs/TextWritingMode.html#/s:10Mapbox.name: horizontal
Structs/TextWritingMode.html#/s:10Mapbox.abstract: If a text’s language supports horizontal writing mode, symbols would be laid out horizontally.

Structs/TextWritingMode.html#/s:10Mapbox.name: vertical
Structs/TextWritingMode.html#/s:10Mapbox.abstract: If a text’s language supports vertical writing mode, symbols would be laid out vertically.

Structs/TextTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.name: map
Structs/TextTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.abstract: The text is translated relative to the map.

Structs/TextTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.name: viewport
Structs/TextTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.abstract: The text is translated relative to the viewport.

Structs/TextTransform.html#/s:10MapboxMa.name: uppercase
Structs/TextTransform.html#/s:10MapboxMa.abstract: Forces all letters to be displayed in uppercase.

Structs/TextTransform.html#/s:10MapboxMa.name: lowercase
Structs/TextTransform.html#/s:10MapboxMa.abstract: Forces all letters to be displayed in lowercase.

Structs/TextRotationAlignment.html#/s:10.name: map
Structs/TextRotationAlignment.html#/s:10.abstract: When {@link SYMBOL_PLACEMENT} is set to {@link Property#SYMBOL_PLACEMENT_POINT}, aligns text east-west. When {@link SYMBOL_PLACEMENT} is set to {@link Property#SYMBOL_PLACEMENT_LINE} or {@link Property#SYMBOL_PLACEMENT_LINE_CENTER}, aligns text x-axes with the line.

Structs/TextRotationAlignment.html#/s:10.name: viewport
Structs/TextRotationAlignment.html#/s:10.abstract: Produces glyphs whose x-axes are aligned with the x-axis of the viewport, regardless of the value of {@link SYMBOL_PLACEMENT}.

Structs/TextRotationAlignment.html#/s:10.name: auto
Structs/TextRotationAlignment.html#/s:10.abstract: When {@link SYMBOL_PLACEMENT} is set to {@link Property#SYMBOL_PLACEMENT_POINT}, this is equivalent to {@link Property#TEXT_ROTATION_ALIGNMENT_VIEWPORT}. When {@link SYMBOL_PLACEMENT} is set to {@link Property#SYMBOL_PLACEMENT_LINE} or {@link Property#SYMBOL_PLACEMENT_LINE_CENTER}, this is equivalent to {@link Property#TEXT_ROTATION_ALIGNMENT_MAP}.

Structs/TextPitchAlignment.html#/s:10Map.name: map
Structs/TextPitchAlignment.html#/s:10Map.abstract: The text is aligned to the plane of the map.

Structs/TextPitchAlignment.html#/s:10Map.name: viewport
Structs/TextPitchAlignment.html#/s:10Map.abstract: The text is aligned to the plane of the viewport.

Structs/TextJustify.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: auto
Structs/TextJustify.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The text is aligned towards the anchor position.

Structs/TextJustify.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: left
Structs/TextJustify.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The text is aligned to the left.

Structs/TextJustify.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: right
Structs/TextJustify.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The text is aligned to the right.

Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: center
Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The center of the text is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: left
Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The left side of the text is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: right
Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The right side of the text is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: top
Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The top of the text is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: bottom
Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The bottom of the text is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: topLeft
Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The top left corner of the text is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: topRight
Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The top right corner of the text is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: bottomLeft
Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The bottom left corner of the text is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: bottomRight
Structs/TextAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The bottom right corner of the text is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/SymbolZOrder.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: auto
Structs/SymbolZOrder.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: Sorts symbols by symbol sort key if set. Otherwise, sorts symbols by their y-position relative to the viewport if {@link ICON_ALLOW_OVERLAP} or {@link TEXT_ALLOW_OVERLAP} is set to {@link TRUE} or {@link ICON_IGNORE_PLACEMENT} or {@link TEXT_IGNORE_PLACEMENT} is {@link FALSE}.

Structs/SymbolZOrder.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: viewportY
Structs/SymbolZOrder.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: Sorts symbols by their y-position relative to the viewport if {@link ICON_ALLOW_OVERLAP} or {@link TEXT_ALLOW_OVERLAP} is set to {@link TRUE} or {@link ICON_IGNORE_PLACEMENT} or {@link TEXT_IGNORE_PLACEMENT} is {@link FALSE}.

Structs/SymbolZOrder.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: source
Structs/SymbolZOrder.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: Sorts symbols by symbol sort key if set. Otherwise, no sorting is applied; symbols are rendered in the same order as the source data.

Structs/SymbolPlacement.html#/s:10Mapbox.name: point
Structs/SymbolPlacement.html#/s:10Mapbox.abstract: The label is placed at the point where the geometry is located.

Structs/SymbolPlacement.html#/s:10Mapbox.name: line
Structs/SymbolPlacement.html#/s:10Mapbox.abstract: The label is placed along the line of the geometry. Can only be used on LineString and Polygon geometries.

Structs/SymbolPlacement.html#/s:10Mapbox.name: lineCenter
Structs/SymbolPlacement.html#/s:10Mapbox.abstract: The label is placed at the center of the line of the geometry. Can only be used on LineString and Polygon geometries. Note that a single feature in a vector tile may contain multiple line geometries.

Structs/StyleTransition.html#/s:10Mapbox.name: duration
Structs/StyleTransition.html#/s:10Mapbox.abstract: Time allotted for transitions to complete in seconds.

Structs/StyleTransition.html#/s:10Mapbox.name: delay
Structs/StyleTransition.html#/s:10Mapbox.abstract: Length of time before a transition begins in seconds.

Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: rawValue
Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: A color string as defined by the Mapbox Style Spec.

Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: init(red:green:blue:)
Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Creates a StyleColor from individually-provided color components. Returns nil

Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: init(red:green:blue:alpha:)
Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Creates a StyleColor from individually-provided color components. Returns nil

Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: init(hue:saturation:lightness:)
Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Creates a StyleColor from individually-provided color components. Returns nil

Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: init(hue:saturation:lightness:alpha:)
Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Creates a StyleColor from individually-provided color components. Returns nil

Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: init(rawValue:)
Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Creates a StyleColor from a color string as defined in the Mapbox Style Spec.

Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: init(from:)
Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: StyleColor can be decoded from an rgba expression or from an rgba color string

Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: encode(to:)
Structs/StyleColor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: StyleColor is always encoded to an rgba color string

Structs/ModelType.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9M.name: common3d
Structs/ModelType.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9M.abstract: Integrated to 3D scene, using depth testing, along with terrain, fill-extrusions and custom layer.

Structs/ModelType.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9M.name: locationIndicator
Structs/ModelType.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9M.abstract: Displayed over other 3D content, occluded by terrain.

Structs/SkyType.html#/s:10MapboxMaps7Sky.name: gradient
Structs/SkyType.html#/s:10MapboxMaps7Sky.abstract: Renders the sky with a gradient that can be configured with {@link SKY_GRADIENT_RADIUS} and {@link SKY_GRADIENT}.

Structs/SkyType.html#/s:10MapboxMaps7Sky.name: atmosphere
Structs/SkyType.html#/s:10MapboxMaps7Sky.abstract: Renders the sky with a simulated atmospheric scattering algorithm, the sun direction can be attached to the light position or explicitly set through {@link SKY_ATMOSPHERE_SUN}.

Enums/ResolvedImage.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: name(_:)
Enums/ResolvedImage.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Use to assign a new resolved image with a name

Enums/ResolvedImage.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: data(_:)
Enums/ResolvedImage.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: A decode layer contains information in the form of ResolvedImageData.

Structs/RasterResampling.html#/s:10Mapbo.name: linear
Structs/RasterResampling.html#/s:10Mapbo.abstract: (Bi)linear filtering interpolates pixel values using the weighted average of the four closest original source pixels creating a smooth but blurry look when overscaled

Structs/RasterResampling.html#/s:10Mapbo.name: nearest
Structs/RasterResampling.html#/s:10Mapbo.abstract: Nearest neighbor filtering interpolates pixel values using the nearest original source pixel creating a sharp but pixelated look when overscaled

Structs/LineTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.name: map
Structs/LineTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.abstract: The line is translated relative to the map.

Structs/LineTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.name: viewport
Structs/LineTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.abstract: The line is translated relative to the viewport.

Structs/LineJoin.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Li.name: bevel
Structs/LineJoin.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Li.abstract: A join with a squared-off end which is drawn beyond the endpoint of the line at a distance of one-half of the line’s width.

Structs/LineJoin.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Li.name: round
Structs/LineJoin.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Li.abstract: A join with a rounded end which is drawn beyond the endpoint of the line at a radius of one-half of the line’s width and centered on the endpoint of the line.

Structs/LineJoin.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Li.name: miter
Structs/LineJoin.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Li.abstract: A join with a sharp, angled corner which is drawn with the outer sides beyond the endpoint of the path until they meet.

Structs/LineCap.html#/s:10MapboxMaps7Lin.name: butt
Structs/LineCap.html#/s:10MapboxMaps7Lin.abstract: A cap with a squared-off end which is drawn to the exact endpoint of the line.

Structs/LineCap.html#/s:10MapboxMaps7Lin.name: round
Structs/LineCap.html#/s:10MapboxMaps7Lin.abstract: A cap with a rounded end which is drawn beyond the endpoint of the line at a radius of one-half of the line’s width and centered on the endpoint of the line.

Structs/LineCap.html#/s:10MapboxMaps7Lin.name: square
Structs/LineCap.html#/s:10MapboxMaps7Lin.abstract: A cap with a squared-off end which is drawn beyond the endpoint of the line at a distance of one-half of the line’s width.

Structs/IconTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.name: map
Structs/IconTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.abstract: Icons are translated relative to the map.

Structs/IconTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.name: viewport
Structs/IconTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.abstract: Icons are translated relative to the viewport.

Structs/IconTextFit.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: none
Structs/IconTextFit.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The icon is displayed at its intrinsic aspect ratio.

Structs/IconTextFit.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: width
Structs/IconTextFit.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The icon is scaled in the x-dimension to fit the width of the text.

Structs/IconTextFit.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: height
Structs/IconTextFit.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The icon is scaled in the y-dimension to fit the height of the text.

Structs/IconTextFit.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: both
Structs/IconTextFit.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The icon is scaled in both x- and y-dimensions.

Structs/IconRotationAlignment.html#/s:10.name: map
Structs/IconRotationAlignment.html#/s:10.abstract: When {@link SYMBOL_PLACEMENT} is set to {@link Property#SYMBOL_PLACEMENT_POINT}, aligns icons east-west. When {@link SYMBOL_PLACEMENT} is set to {@link Property#SYMBOL_PLACEMENT_LINE} or {@link Property#SYMBOL_PLACEMENT_LINE_CENTER}, aligns icon x-axes with the line.

Structs/IconRotationAlignment.html#/s:10.name: viewport
Structs/IconRotationAlignment.html#/s:10.abstract: Produces icons whose x-axes are aligned with the x-axis of the viewport, regardless of the value of {@link SYMBOL_PLACEMENT}.

Structs/IconRotationAlignment.html#/s:10.name: auto
Structs/IconRotationAlignment.html#/s:10.abstract: When {@link SYMBOL_PLACEMENT} is set to {@link Property#SYMBOL_PLACEMENT_POINT}, this is equivalent to {@link Property#ICON_ROTATION_ALIGNMENT_VIEWPORT}. When {@link SYMBOL_PLACEMENT} is set to {@link Property#SYMBOL_PLACEMENT_LINE} or {@link Property#SYMBOL_PLACEMENT_LINE_CENTER}, this is equivalent to {@link Property#ICON_ROTATION_ALIGNMENT_MAP}.

Structs/IconPitchAlignment.html#/s:10Map.name: map
Structs/IconPitchAlignment.html#/s:10Map.abstract: The icon is aligned to the plane of the map.

Structs/IconPitchAlignment.html#/s:10Map.name: viewport
Structs/IconPitchAlignment.html#/s:10Map.abstract: The icon is aligned to the plane of the viewport.

Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: center
Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The center of the icon is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: left
Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The left side of the icon is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: right
Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The right side of the icon is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: top
Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The top of the icon is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: bottom
Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The bottom of the icon is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: topLeft
Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The top left corner of the icon is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: topRight
Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The top right corner of the icon is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: bottomLeft
Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The bottom left corner of the icon is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: bottomRight
Structs/IconAnchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The bottom right corner of the icon is placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/HillshadeIlluminationAnchor.html.name: map
Structs/HillshadeIlluminationAnchor.html.abstract: The hillshade illumination is relative to the north direction.

Structs/HillshadeIlluminationAnchor.html.name: viewport
Structs/HillshadeIlluminationAnchor.html.abstract: The hillshade illumination is relative to the top of the viewport.

Structs/FillTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.name: map
Structs/FillTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.abstract: The fill is translated relative to the map.

Structs/FillTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.name: viewport
Structs/FillTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10Ma.abstract: The fill is translated relative to the viewport.

Structs/FillExtrusionTranslateAnchor.htm.name: map
Structs/FillExtrusionTranslateAnchor.htm.abstract: The fill extrusion is translated relative to the map.

Structs/FillExtrusionTranslateAnchor.htm.name: viewport
Structs/FillExtrusionTranslateAnchor.htm.abstract: The fill extrusion is translated relative to the viewport.

Structs/CircleTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10.name: map
Structs/CircleTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10.abstract: The circle is translated relative to the map.

Structs/CircleTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10.name: viewport
Structs/CircleTranslateAnchor.html#/s:10.abstract: The circle is translated relative to the viewport.

Structs/CirclePitchScale.html#/s:10Mapbo.name: map
Structs/CirclePitchScale.html#/s:10Mapbo.abstract: Circles are scaled according to their apparent distance to the camera.

Structs/CirclePitchAlignment.html#/s:10M.name: map
Structs/CirclePitchAlignment.html#/s:10M.abstract: The circle is aligned to the plane of the map.

Structs/CirclePitchAlignment.html#/s:10M.name: viewport
Structs/CirclePitchAlignment.html#/s:10M.abstract: The circle is aligned to the plane of the viewport.

Structs/Anchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps6Anch.name: map
Structs/Anchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps6Anch.abstract: The position of the light source is aligned to the rotation of the map.

Structs/Anchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps6Anch.name: viewport
Structs/Anchor.html#/s:10MapboxMaps6Anch.abstract: The position of the light source is aligned to the rotation of the viewport.

Structs/Anchor.html.name: Anchor
Structs/Anchor.html.abstract: Whether extruded geometries are lit relative to the map or viewport.

Structs/CirclePitchAlignment.html.name: CirclePitchAlignment
Structs/CirclePitchAlignment.html.abstract: Orientation of circle when map is pitched.

Structs/CirclePitchScale.html.name: CirclePitchScale
Structs/CirclePitchScale.html.abstract: Controls the scaling behavior of the circle when the map is pitched.

Structs/HillshadeIlluminationAnchor.html.name: HillshadeIlluminationAnchor
Structs/HillshadeIlluminationAnchor.html.abstract: Direction of light source when map is rotated.

Structs/IconAnchor.html.name: IconAnchor
Structs/IconAnchor.html.abstract: Part of the icon placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/IconPitchAlignment.html.name: IconPitchAlignment
Structs/IconPitchAlignment.html.abstract: Orientation of icon when map is pitched.

Structs/IconRotationAlignment.html.name: IconRotationAlignment
Structs/IconRotationAlignment.html.abstract: In combination with symbol-placement, determines the rotation behavior of icons.

Structs/IconTextFit.html.name: IconTextFit
Structs/IconTextFit.html.abstract: Scales the icon to fit around the associated text.

Structs/RasterResampling.html.name: RasterResampling
Structs/RasterResampling.html.abstract: The resampling/interpolation method to use for overscaling, also known as texture magnification filter

Structs/ModelType.html.name: ModelType
Structs/ModelType.html.abstract: Defines rendering behavior of model in respect to other 3D scene objects.

Structs/StyleColor.html.name: StyleColor
Structs/StyleColor.html.abstract: Represents a color as defined by the Mapbox Style Spec

Structs/SymbolZOrder.html.name: SymbolZOrder
Structs/SymbolZOrder.html.abstract: Determines whether overlapping symbols in the same layer are rendered in the order that they appear in the data source or by their y-position relative to the viewport. To control the order and prioritization of symbols otherwise, use symbol-sort-key.

Structs/TextAnchor.html.name: TextAnchor
Structs/TextAnchor.html.abstract: Part of the text placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/TextPitchAlignment.html.name: TextPitchAlignment
Structs/TextPitchAlignment.html.abstract: Orientation of text when map is pitched.

Structs/TextRotationAlignment.html.name: TextRotationAlignment
Structs/TextRotationAlignment.html.abstract: In combination with symbol-placement, determines the rotation behavior of the individual glyphs forming the text.

Structs/TextTransform.html.name: TextTransform
Structs/TextTransform.html.abstract: Specifies how to capitalize text, similar to the CSS text-transform property.

Structs/TextWritingMode.html.name: TextWritingMode
Structs/TextWritingMode.html.abstract: The property allows control over a symbol’s orientation. Note that the property values act as a hint, so that a symbol whose language doesnâ€™t support the provided orientation will be laid out in its natural orientation. Example: English point symbol will be rendered horizontally even if array value contains single ‘vertical’ enum value. For symbol with point placement, the order of elements in an array define priority order for the placement of an orientation variant. For symbol with line placement, the default text writing mode is either [‘horizontal’, ‘vertical’] or [‘vertical’, ‘horizontal’], the order doesn’t affect the placement.

Structs/ModelScaleMode.html.name: ModelScaleMode
Structs/ModelScaleMode.html.abstract: Defines scaling mode. Only applies to location-indicator type layers.

Structs/CustomLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: renderer
Structs/CustomLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Custom Metal rendering providing API for arbitrary metal operations on top of the MapboxMap

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: filter
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: An expression specifying conditions on source features.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: source
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Name of a source description to be used for this layer.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: sourceLayer
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Layer to use from a vector tile source.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: slot
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The slot this layer is assigned to. If specified, and a slot with that name exists, it will be placed at that position in the layer order.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: minZoom
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The minimum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels less than the minzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: maxZoom
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The maximum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels equal to or greater than the maxzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: modelAmbientOcclusionIntensity
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Intensity of the ambient occlusion if present in the 3D model.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: modelColor
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The tint color of the model layer. model-color-mix-intensity (defaults to 0) defines tint(mix) intensity - this means that, this color is not used unless model-color-mix-intensity gets value greater than 0.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: modelColorMixIntensity
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Intensity of model-color (on a scale from 0 to 1) in color mix with original 3D model’s colors. Higher number will present a higher model-color contribution in mix.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: modelCutoffFadeRange
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: This parameter defines the range for the fade-out effect before an automatic content cutoff on pitched map views. The automatic cutoff range is calculated according to the minimum required zoom level of the source and layer. The fade range is expressed in relation to the height of the map view. A value of 1.0 indicates that the content is faded to the same extent as the map’s height in pixels, while a value close to zero represents a sharp cutoff. When the value is set to 0.0, the cutoff is completely disabled. Note: The property has no effect on the map if terrain is enabled.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: modelEmissiveStrength
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Strength of the emission. There is no emission for value 0. For value 1.0, only emissive component (no shading) is displayed and values above 1.0 produce light contribution to surrounding area, for some of the parts (e.g. doors). Expressions that depend on measure-light are not supported when using GeoJSON or vector tile as the model layer source.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: modelHeightBasedEmissiveStrengthMultiplier
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Emissive strength multiplier along model height (gradient begin, gradient end, value at begin, value at end, gradient curve power (logarithmic scale, curve power = pow(10, val)).

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: modelRotation
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The rotation of the model in euler angles [lon, lat, z].

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: modelRoughness
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Material roughness. Material is fully smooth for value 0, and fully rough for value 1. Affects only layers using batched-model source.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: modelScaleMode
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Defines scaling mode. Only applies to location-indicator type layers.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: modelTranslation
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: The translation of the model in meters in form of [longitudal, latitudal, altitude] offsets.

Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.name: modelType
Structs/ModelLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps1.abstract: Defines rendering behavior of model in respect to other 3D scene objects.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: id
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Unique layer name

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: type
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Rendering type of this layer.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: filter
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: An expression specifying conditions on source features.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: source
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Name of a source description to be used for this layer.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: sourceLayer
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Layer to use from a vector tile source.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: slot
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The slot this layer is assigned to. If specified, and a slot with that name exists, it will be placed at that position in the layer order.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: minZoom
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The minimum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels less than the minzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: maxZoom
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The maximum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels equal to or greater than the maxzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: visibility
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Whether this layer is displayed.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconAllowOverlap
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: If true, the icon will be visible even if it collides with other previously drawn symbols.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconAnchor
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Part of the icon placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconIgnorePlacement
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: If true, other symbols can be visible even if they collide with the icon.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconImage
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Name of image in sprite to use for drawing an image background.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconKeepUpright
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: If true, the icon may be flipped to prevent it from being rendered upside-down.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconOffset
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Offset distance of icon from its anchor. Positive values indicate right and down, while negative values indicate left and up. Each component is multiplied by the value of icon-size to obtain the final offset in pixels. When combined with icon-rotate the offset will be as if the rotated direction was up.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconOptional
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: If true, text will display without their corresponding icons when the icon collides with other symbols and the text does not.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconPadding
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Size of the additional area around the icon bounding box used for detecting symbol collisions.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconPitchAlignment
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Orientation of icon when map is pitched.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconRotate
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Rotates the icon clockwise.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconRotationAlignment
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: In combination with symbol-placement, determines the rotation behavior of icons.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconSize
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Scales the original size of the icon by the provided factor. The new pixel size of the image will be the original pixel size multiplied by icon-size. 1 is the original size; 3 triples the size of the image.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconTextFit
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Scales the icon to fit around the associated text.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconTextFitPadding
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Size of the additional area added to dimensions determined by icon-text-fit, in clockwise order: top, right, bottom, left.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: symbolAvoidEdges
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: If true, the symbols will not cross tile edges to avoid mutual collisions. Recommended in layers that don’t have enough padding in the vector tile to prevent collisions, or if it is a point symbol layer placed after a line symbol layer. When using a client that supports global collision detection, like Mapbox GL JS version 0.42.0 or greater, enabling this property is not needed to prevent clipped labels at tile boundaries.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: symbolPlacement
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Label placement relative to its geometry.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: symbolSortKey
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Sorts features in ascending order based on this value. Features with lower sort keys are drawn and placed first. When icon-allow-overlap or text-allow-overlap is false, features with a lower sort key will have priority during placement. When icon-allow-overlap or text-allow-overlap is set to true, features with a higher sort key will overlap over features with a lower sort key.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: symbolSpacing
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Distance between two symbol anchors.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: symbolZElevate
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Position symbol on buildings (both fill extrusions and models) rooftops. In order to have minimal impact on performance, this is supported only when fill-extrusion-height is not zoom-dependent and remains unchanged. For fading in buildings when zooming in, fill-extrusion-vertical-scale should be used and symbols would raise with building rooftops. Symbols are sorted by elevation, except in cases when viewport-y sorting or symbol-sort-key are applied.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: symbolZOrder
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Determines whether overlapping symbols in the same layer are rendered in the order that they appear in the data source or by their y-position relative to the viewport. To control the order and prioritization of symbols otherwise, use symbol-sort-key.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textAllowOverlap
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: If true, the text will be visible even if it collides with other previously drawn symbols.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textAnchor
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Part of the text placed closest to the anchor.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textField
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Value to use for a text label. If a plain string is provided, it will be treated as a formatted with default/inherited formatting options. SDF images are not supported in formatted text and will be ignored.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textFont
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Font stack to use for displaying text.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textIgnorePlacement
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: If true, other symbols can be visible even if they collide with the text.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textJustify
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Text justification options.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textKeepUpright
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: If true, the text may be flipped vertically to prevent it from being rendered upside-down.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textLetterSpacing
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Text tracking amount.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textLineHeight
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Text leading value for multi-line text.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textMaxAngle
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Maximum angle change between adjacent characters.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textMaxWidth
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The maximum line width for text wrapping.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textOffset
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Offset distance of text from its anchor. Positive values indicate right and down, while negative values indicate left and up. If used with text-variable-anchor, input values will be taken as absolute values. Offsets along the x- and y-axis will be applied automatically based on the anchor position.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textOptional
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: If true, icons will display without their corresponding text when the text collides with other symbols and the icon does not.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textPadding
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Size of the additional area around the text bounding box used for detecting symbol collisions.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textPitchAlignment
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Orientation of text when map is pitched.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textRadialOffset
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Radial offset of text, in the direction of the symbol’s anchor. Useful in combination with text-variable-anchor, which defaults to using the two-dimensional text-offset if present.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textRotate
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Rotates the text clockwise.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textRotationAlignment
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: In combination with symbol-placement, determines the rotation behavior of the individual glyphs forming the text.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textSize
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Font size.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textTransform
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Specifies how to capitalize text, similar to the CSS text-transform property.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textVariableAnchor
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: To increase the chance of placing high-priority labels on the map, you can provide an array of text-anchor locations: the renderer will attempt to place the label at each location, in order, before moving onto the next label. Use text-justify: auto to choose justification based on anchor position. To apply an offset, use the text-radial-offset or the two-dimensional text-offset.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textWritingMode
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The property allows control over a symbol’s orientation. Note that the property values act as a hint, so that a symbol whose language doesnâ€™t support the provided orientation will be laid out in its natural orientation. Example: English point symbol will be rendered horizontally even if array value contains single ‘vertical’ enum value. For symbol with point placement, the order of elements in an array define priority order for the placement of an orientation variant. For symbol with line placement, the default text writing mode is either [‘horizontal’, ‘vertical’] or [‘vertical’, ‘horizontal’], the order doesn’t affect the placement.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconColor
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The color of the icon. This can only be used with SDF icons.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconColorTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for iconColor.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconColorSaturation
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Controls saturation level of the symbol icon. With the default value of 1 the icon color is preserved while with a value of 0 it is fully desaturated and looks black and white.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconColorSaturationTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for iconColorSaturation.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconEmissiveStrength
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Controls the intensity of light emitted on the source features.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconEmissiveStrengthTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for iconEmissiveStrength.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconHaloBlur
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Fade out the halo towards the outside.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconHaloBlurTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for iconHaloBlur.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconHaloColor
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The color of the icon’s halo. Icon halos can only be used with SDF icons.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconHaloColorTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for iconHaloColor.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconHaloWidth
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Distance of halo to the icon outline.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconHaloWidthTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for iconHaloWidth.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconImageCrossFade
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Controls the transition progress between the image variants of icon-image. Zero means the first variant is used, one is the second, and in between they are blended together.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconImageCrossFadeTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for iconImageCrossFade.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconOpacity
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The opacity at which the icon will be drawn.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconOpacityTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for iconOpacity.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconTranslate
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Distance that the icon’s anchor is moved from its original placement. Positive values indicate right and down, while negative values indicate left and up.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconTranslateTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for iconTranslate.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: iconTranslateAnchor
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Controls the frame of reference for icon-translate.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textColor
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The color with which the text will be drawn.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textColorTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for textColor.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textEmissiveStrength
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Controls the intensity of light emitted on the source features.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textEmissiveStrengthTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for textEmissiveStrength.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textHaloBlur
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The halo’s fadeout distance towards the outside.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textHaloBlurTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for textHaloBlur.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textHaloColor
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The color of the text’s halo, which helps it stand out from backgrounds.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textHaloColorTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for textHaloColor.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textHaloWidth
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Distance of halo to the font outline. Max text halo width is ¼ of the font-size.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textHaloWidthTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for textHaloWidth.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textOpacity
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The opacity at which the text will be drawn.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textOpacityTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for textOpacity.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textTranslate
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Distance that the text’s anchor is moved from its original placement. Positive values indicate right and down, while negative values indicate left and up.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textTranslateTransition
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for textTranslate.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: textTranslateAnchor
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Controls the frame of reference for text-translate.

Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: init(id:source:)
Structs/SymbolLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.name: slot
Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.abstract: The slot this layer is assigned to. If specified, and a slot with that name exists, it will be placed at that position in the layer order.

Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.name: minZoom
Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.abstract: The minimum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels less than the minzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.name: maxZoom
Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.abstract: The maximum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels equal to or greater than the maxzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.name: skyAtmosphereColor
Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.abstract: A color used to tweak the main atmospheric scattering coefficients. Using white applies the default coefficients giving the natural blue color to the atmosphere. This color affects how heavily the corresponding wavelength is represented during scattering. The alpha channel describes the density of the atmosphere, with 1 maximum density and 0 no density.

Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.name: skyAtmosphereHaloColor
Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.abstract: A color applied to the atmosphere sun halo. The alpha channel describes how strongly the sun halo is represented in an atmosphere sky layer.

Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.name: skyAtmosphereSun
Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.abstract: Position of the sun center [a azimuthal angle, p polar angle]. The azimuthal angle indicates the position of the sun relative to 0 degree north, where degrees proceed clockwise. The polar angle indicates the height of the sun, where 0 degree is directly above, at zenith, and 90 degree at the horizon. When this property is ommitted, the sun center is directly inherited from the light position.

Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.name: skyAtmosphereSunIntensity
Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.abstract: Intensity of the sun as a light source in the atmosphere (on a scale from 0 to a 100). Setting higher values will brighten up the sky.

Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.name: skyGradient
Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.abstract: Defines a radial color gradient with which to color the sky. The color values can be interpolated with an expression using sky-radial-progress. The range [0, 1] for the interpolant covers a radial distance (in degrees) of [0, sky-gradient-radius] centered at the position specified by sky-gradient-center.

Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.name: skyGradientCenter
Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.abstract: Position of the gradient center [a azimuthal angle, p polar angle]. The azimuthal angle indicates the position of the gradient center relative to 0 degree north, where degrees proceed clockwise. The polar angle indicates the height of the gradient center, where 0 degree is directly above, at zenith, and 90 degree at the horizon.

Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.name: skyGradientRadius
Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.abstract: The angular distance (measured in degrees) from sky-gradient-center up to which the gradient extends. A value of 180 causes the gradient to wrap around to the opposite direction from sky-gradient-center.

Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.name: skyOpacity
Structs/SkyLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps8Sk.abstract: The opacity of the entire sky layer.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: id
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Unique layer name

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: type
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Rendering type of this layer.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: filter
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: An expression specifying conditions on source features.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: source
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Name of a source description to be used for this layer.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: sourceLayer
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Layer to use from a vector tile source.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: slot
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The slot this layer is assigned to. If specified, and a slot with that name exists, it will be placed at that position in the layer order.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: minZoom
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The minimum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels less than the minzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: maxZoom
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The maximum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels equal to or greater than the maxzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: visibility
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Whether this layer is displayed.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterArrayBand
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Displayed band of raster array source layer

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterBrightnessMax
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Increase or reduce the brightness of the image. The value is the maximum brightness.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterBrightnessMaxTransition
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for rasterBrightnessMax.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterBrightnessMin
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Increase or reduce the brightness of the image. The value is the minimum brightness.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterBrightnessMinTransition
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for rasterBrightnessMin.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterColor
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Defines a color map by which to colorize a raster layer, parameterized by the ["raster-value"] expression and evaluated at 256 uniformly spaced steps over the range specified by raster-color-range.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterColorMix
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: When raster-color is active, specifies the combination of source RGB channels used to compute the raster value. Computed using the equation mix.r * src.r + mix.g * src.g + mix.b * src.b + mix.a. The first three components specify the mix of source red, green, and blue channels, respectively. The fourth component serves as a constant offset and is not multipled by source alpha. Source alpha is instead carried through and applied as opacity to the colorized result. Default value corresponds to RGB luminosity.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterColorMixTransition
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for rasterColorMix.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterColorRange
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: When raster-color is active, specifies the range over which raster-color is tabulated. Units correspond to the computed raster value via raster-color-mix.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterColorRangeTransition
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for rasterColorRange.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterContrast
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Increase or reduce the contrast of the image.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterContrastTransition
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for rasterContrast.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterElevation
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Specifies an uniform elevation from the ground, in meters. Only supported with image sources.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterElevationTransition
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for rasterElevation.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterEmissiveStrength
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Controls the intensity of light emitted on the source features.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterEmissiveStrengthTransition
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for rasterEmissiveStrength.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterFadeDuration
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Fade duration when a new tile is added.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterHueRotate
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Rotates hues around the color wheel.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterHueRotateTransition
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for rasterHueRotate.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterOpacity
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The opacity at which the image will be drawn.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterOpacityTransition
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for rasterOpacity.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterResampling
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: The resampling/interpolation method to use for overscaling, also known as texture magnification filter

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterSaturation
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Increase or reduce the saturation of the image.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: rasterSaturationTransition
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Transition options for rasterSaturation.

Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.name: init(id:source:)
Structs/RasterLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: id
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Unique layer name

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: type
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Rendering type of this layer.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: slot
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The slot this layer is assigned to. If specified, and a slot with that name exists, it will be placed at that position in the layer order.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: minZoom
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The minimum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels less than the minzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: maxZoom
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The maximum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels equal to or greater than the maxzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: visibility
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Whether this layer is displayed.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: bearingImage
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Name of image in sprite to use as the middle of the location indicator.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: shadowImage
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Name of image in sprite to use as the background of the location indicator.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: topImage
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Name of image in sprite to use as the top of the location indicator.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: accuracyRadius
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The accuracy, in meters, of the position source used to retrieve the position of the location indicator.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: accuracyRadiusTransition
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Transition options for accuracyRadius.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: accuracyRadiusBorderColor
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The color for drawing the accuracy radius border. To adjust transparency, set the alpha component of the color accordingly.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: accuracyRadiusBorderColorTransition
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Transition options for accuracyRadiusBorderColor.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: accuracyRadiusColor
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The color for drawing the accuracy radius, as a circle. To adjust transparency, set the alpha component of the color accordingly.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: accuracyRadiusColorTransition
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Transition options for accuracyRadiusColor.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: bearing
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The bearing of the location indicator.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: bearingTransition
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Transition options for bearing.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: bearingImageSize
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The size of the bearing image, as a scale factor applied to the size of the specified image.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: bearingImageSizeTransition
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Transition options for bearingImageSize.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: emphasisCircleColor
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The color of the circle emphasizing the indicator. To adjust transparency, set the alpha component of the color accordingly.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: emphasisCircleColorTransition
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Transition options for emphasisCircleColor.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: emphasisCircleRadius
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The radius, in pixel, of the circle emphasizing the indicator, drawn between the accuracy radius and the indicator shadow.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: emphasisCircleRadiusTransition
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Transition options for emphasisCircleRadius.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: imagePitchDisplacement
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The displacement off the center of the top image and the shadow image when the pitch of the map is greater than 0. This helps producing a three-dimensional appearence.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: location
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: An array of [latitude, longitude, altitude] position of the location indicator.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: locationTransition
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Transition options for location.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: locationIndicatorOpacity
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The opacity of the entire location indicator layer.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: locationIndicatorOpacityTransition
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Transition options for locationIndicatorOpacity.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: perspectiveCompensation
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The amount of the perspective compensation, between 0 and 1. A value of 1 produces a location indicator of constant width across the screen. A value of 0 makes it scale naturally according to the viewing projection.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: shadowImageSize
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The size of the shadow image, as a scale factor applied to the size of the specified image.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: shadowImageSizeTransition
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Transition options for shadowImageSize.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: topImageSize
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: The size of the top image, as a scale factor applied to the size of the specified image.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: topImageSizeTransition
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Transition options for topImageSize.

Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.name: init(id:)
Structs/LocationIndicatorLayer.html#/s:1.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: id
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Unique layer name

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: type
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Rendering type of this layer.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: filter
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: An expression specifying conditions on source features.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: source
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Name of a source description to be used for this layer.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: sourceLayer
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Layer to use from a vector tile source.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: slot
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: The slot this layer is assigned to. If specified, and a slot with that name exists, it will be placed at that position in the layer order.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: minZoom
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: The minimum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels less than the minzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: maxZoom
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: The maximum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels equal to or greater than the maxzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: visibility
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Whether this layer is displayed.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineCap
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: The display of line endings.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineJoin
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: The display of lines when joining.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineMiterLimit
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Used to automatically convert miter joins to bevel joins for sharp angles.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineRoundLimit
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Used to automatically convert round joins to miter joins for shallow angles.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineSortKey
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Sorts features in ascending order based on this value. Features with a higher sort key will appear above features with a lower sort key.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineBlur
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Blur applied to the line, in pixels.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineBlurTransition
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Transition options for lineBlur.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineBorderColor
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: The color of the line border. If line-border-width is greater than zero and the alpha value of this color is 0 (default), the color for the border will be selected automatically based on the line color.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineBorderColorTransition
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Transition options for lineBorderColor.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineBorderWidth
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: The width of the line border. A value of zero means no border.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineBorderWidthTransition
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Transition options for lineBorderWidth.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineColor
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: The color with which the line will be drawn.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineColorTransition
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Transition options for lineColor.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineDasharray
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Specifies the lengths of the alternating dashes and gaps that form the dash pattern. The lengths are later scaled by the line width. To convert a dash length to pixels, multiply the length by the current line width. Note that GeoJSON sources with lineMetrics: true specified won’t render dashed lines to the expected scale. Also note that zoom-dependent expressions will be evaluated only at integer zoom levels.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineDepthOcclusionFactor
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Decrease line layer opacity based on occlusion from 3D objects. Value 0 disables occlusion, value 1 means fully occluded.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineDepthOcclusionFactorTransition
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Transition options for lineDepthOcclusionFactor.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineEmissiveStrength
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Controls the intensity of light emitted on the source features.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineEmissiveStrengthTransition
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Transition options for lineEmissiveStrength.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineGapWidth
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Draws a line casing outside of a line’s actual path. Value indicates the width of the inner gap.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineGapWidthTransition
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Transition options for lineGapWidth.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineGradient
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: A gradient used to color a line feature at various distances along its length. Defined using a step or interpolate expression which outputs a color for each corresponding line-progress input value. line-progress is a percentage of the line feature’s total length as measured on the webmercator projected coordinate plane (a number between 0 and 1). Can only be used with GeoJSON sources that specify "lineMetrics": true.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineOffset
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: The line’s offset. For linear features, a positive value offsets the line to the right, relative to the direction of the line, and a negative value to the left. For polygon features, a positive value results in an inset, and a negative value results in an outset.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineOffsetTransition
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Transition options for lineOffset.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineOpacity
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: The opacity at which the line will be drawn.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineOpacityTransition
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Transition options for lineOpacity.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: linePattern
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Name of image in sprite to use for drawing image lines. For seamless patterns, image width must be a factor of two (2, 4, 8, …, 512). Note that zoom-dependent expressions will be evaluated only at integer zoom levels.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineTranslate
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: The geometry’s offset. Values are [x, y] where negatives indicate left and up, respectively.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineTranslateTransition
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Transition options for lineTranslate.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineTranslateAnchor
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Controls the frame of reference for line-translate.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineTrimOffset
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: The line part between [trim-start, trim-end] will be marked as transparent to make a route vanishing effect. The line trim-off offset is based on the whole line range [0.0, 1.0].

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineWidth
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Stroke thickness.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: lineWidthTransition
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Transition options for lineWidth.

Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.name: init(id:source:)
Structs/LineLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9L.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: id
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Unique layer name

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: type
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Rendering type of this layer.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: filter
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: An expression specifying conditions on source features.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: source
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Name of a source description to be used for this layer.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: sourceLayer
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Layer to use from a vector tile source.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: slot
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: The slot this layer is assigned to. If specified, and a slot with that name exists, it will be placed at that position in the layer order.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: minZoom
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: The minimum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels less than the minzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: maxZoom
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: The maximum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels equal to or greater than the maxzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: visibility
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Whether this layer is displayed.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: hillshadeAccentColor
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: The shading color used to accentuate rugged terrain like sharp cliffs and gorges.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: hillshadeAccentColorTransition
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Transition options for hillshadeAccentColor.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: hillshadeEmissiveStrength
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Controls the intensity of light emitted on the source features.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: hillshadeEmissiveStrengthTransition
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Transition options for hillshadeEmissiveStrength.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: hillshadeExaggeration
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Intensity of the hillshade

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: hillshadeExaggerationTransition
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Transition options for hillshadeExaggeration.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: hillshadeHighlightColor
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: The shading color of areas that faces towards the light source.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: hillshadeHighlightColorTransition
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Transition options for hillshadeHighlightColor.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: hillshadeIlluminationAnchor
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Direction of light source when map is rotated.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: hillshadeIlluminationDirection
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: The direction of the light source used to generate the hillshading with 0 as the top of the viewport if hillshade-illumination-anchor is set to viewport and due north if hillshade-illumination-anchor is set to map and no 3d lights enabled. If hillshade-illumination-anchor is set to map and 3d lights enabled, the direction from 3d lights is used instead.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: hillshadeShadowColor
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: The shading color of areas that face away from the light source.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: hillshadeShadowColorTransition
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Transition options for hillshadeShadowColor.

Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.name: init(id:source:)
Structs/HillshadeLayer.html#/s:10MapboxM.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: filter
Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: An expression specifying conditions on source features.

Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: source
Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: Name of a source description to be used for this layer.

Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: sourceLayer
Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: Layer to use from a vector tile source.

Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: slot
Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: The slot this layer is assigned to. If specified, and a slot with that name exists, it will be placed at that position in the layer order.

Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: minZoom
Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: The minimum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels less than the minzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: maxZoom
Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: The maximum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels equal to or greater than the maxzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: heatmapColor
Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: Defines the color of each pixel based on its density value in a heatmap. Should be an expression that uses ["heatmap-density"] as input.

Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: heatmapIntensity
Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: Similar to heatmap-weight but controls the intensity of the heatmap globally. Primarily used for adjusting the heatmap based on zoom level.

Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: heatmapOpacity
Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: The global opacity at which the heatmap layer will be drawn.

Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: heatmapRadius
Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: Radius of influence of one heatmap point in pixels. Increasing the value makes the heatmap smoother, but less detailed. queryRenderedFeatures on heatmap layers will return points within this radius.

Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.name: heatmapWeight
Structs/HeatmapLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMap.abstract: A measure of how much an individual point contributes to the heatmap. A value of 10 would be equivalent to having 10 points of weight 1 in the same spot. Especially useful when combined with clustering.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: id
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: Unique layer name

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: type
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: Rendering type of this layer.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: filter
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: An expression specifying conditions on source features.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: source
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: Name of a source description to be used for this layer.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: sourceLayer
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: Layer to use from a vector tile source.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: slot
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: The slot this layer is assigned to. If specified, and a slot with that name exists, it will be placed at that position in the layer order.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: minZoom
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: The minimum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels less than the minzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: maxZoom
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: The maximum zoom level for the layer. At zoom levels equal to or greater than the maxzoom, the layer will be hidden.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: visibility
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: Whether this layer is displayed.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: fillSortKey
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: Sorts features in ascending order based on this value. Features with a higher sort key will appear above features with a lower sort key.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: fillAntialias
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: Whether or not the fill should be antialiased.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: fillColor
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: The color of the filled part of this layer. This color can be specified as rgba with an alpha component and the color’s opacity will not affect the opacity of the 1px stroke, if it is used.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: fillColorTransition
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: Transition options for fillColor.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: fillEmissiveStrength
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: Controls the intensity of light emitted on the source features.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: fillEmissiveStrengthTransition
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: Transition options for fillEmissiveStrength.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: fillOpacity
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: The opacity of the entire fill layer. In contrast to the fill-color, this value will also affect the 1px stroke around the fill, if the stroke is used.

Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.name: fillOpacityTransition
Structs/FillLayer.html#/s:10MapboxMaps9F.abstract: Transition options for fillOpacity.
